questions.question: What is the primary color of the outer packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product's container?
What material appears to constitute the outer packaging?
Describe the apparent texture of the outer packaging surface.
Is there any noticeable printing or labeling on the packaging?
What is the color of the primary label on the package?
What kind of information is visible on the product label?
Are there any symbols or icons present on the package?
What is the apparent size of the product's package (relative to a standard item)?
Does the packaging show signs of damage or wear?
Can you identify any specific brand names or logos?
What is the dominant language displayed on the label?
Does the box contain visible seams or joins?
Is the packaging sealed or easily openable?
Is the color of the cardboard a light or dark shade of brown?
